text: (itaik kelviyurra aracar appenkalai alaittu) ‘‘ninkal yusuhpai unkal viruppattirkinankumaru alaitta potu unkalukku erpattatenna?'' Enru kettar. Atarku appenkal ‘‘allah mikap paricuttamanavan; nankal avaritattil oru tinkaiyum ariyavillai'' enru kurivittarkal. Atipatiyin manaiviyo iccamayam unmai velippattu vittatu; nantan avarai virumpi alaitten. (Avar kuriyatil) niccayamaka avar unmaiye connar'' enru kurinal
